we tried to figure out what this was .

output.sentences: The school class visited the park for their field day.
They looked at the abstract statues in the park.
The class learned about the subject of art interpretation.
This lone figure of a statue is odd.
The class learned that each of the statues are meant to be deciphered as each sees it.
